Summary: Saw about 8-10 lights moving in south easterly direction at 8 PM Saturday, October 22, 1011 in the area bounded by Haverford Ave-Remington Rd Powdermil and Monoa Rds.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia

divs: Sighting DetailsSaw about 8-10 lights moving in south easterly direction at 8 PM Saturday, October 22, 1011 in the area bounded by Haverford Ave-Remington Rd Powdermil and Monoa Rds. Took @ 1 minute of phone video cam of two of the lights remaining stationery over my head off about 15 degrees.
